dataManagement

Class FileUpdateManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • dataManagement.FileUpdateManager

  • public class FileUpdateManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Similar to DocsIDManager class, this class manages the dates of the documents, to know if they are updated or outdated.
    Author:
    carlosgrivera
